content.rendered:
Auditing

Registered Auditors in Abu Dhabi

We are approved auditors for companies located in Abu Dhabi.

Book A Free Consultation

Home

Government-Approved Auditors in Abu Dhabi, UAE

Abu Dhabi is the business capital of UAE where the fiscal position of UAE remains strong over the coming year. With rising number of locally and internationally established companies, Abu Dhabi has a successful business outlook in the UAE. Registered auditors in Abu Dhabi increase the business potential of companies by expanding their further operations and financing operations. Independent audit is an important tool which determines the positive performance of a company.

A & A associate is one of the top-rated audit firms in Abu Dhabi providing high-quality audit and assurance services at the most cost-effective fees structure.

As per the regulations enacted by Abu Dhabi securities exchange, companies should undergo annual audit to ensure that these companies are maintaining highest level of corporate governance. Here, auditors in Abu Dhabi play a vital role supporting these companies with best audit services.

Why choose Abu Dhabi as your business destination?

With trailblazing infrastructure and fast-paced life, SME friendly businesses find Abu Dhabi as an ideal destination. Abu Dhabi contributes to 65% of the total economy of UAE and ensures ease of business! The unmatched infrastructure, investment, and trade facilities boost up the business environment.

Abu Dhabi provides business in both non-free zone and free zones. However, the guidance of registered auditors in Abu Dhabi with professional auditing and accounting services will keep you financially stable. Conducting business on mainland and free zone has its own benefits, get access to a wider market in the mainland company formation; similarly, enjoy more tax benefits in the free zones.

Audit firms in Abu Dhabi

Whether you register your company in the free zone or mainland, it’s mandatory to provide audit certificates. Only registered auditors in Abu Dhabi are allowed to provide accounting and auditing services.

If you’re choosing a free zone, respective authorities will provide a list of approved auditors in Abu Dhabi who take the responsibility of conducting auditing for the respective free zone companies.

Benefits of choosing the best audit firm in Abu Dhabi,

With trailblazing infrastructure and fast-paced life, SME friendly businesses find Abu Dhabi as an ideal destination. Abu Dhabi contributes to 65% of the total economy of UAE and ensures ease of business! The unmatched infrastructure, investment, and trade facilities boost up the business environment.

Abu Dhabi provides business in both non-free zone and free zones. However, the guidance of registered auditors in Abu Dhabi with professional auditing and accounting services will keep you financially stable. Conducting business on mainland and free zone has its own benefits, get access to a wider market in the mainland company formation; similarly, enjoy more tax benefits in the free zones.

  • Is a leading Auditing Firm in Dubai, UAE
  • Is an approved auditor in the list of SAIF Zone auditors
  • Will ensure the independency on the service
  • Provides International Standard on Quality of Service
  • Ensure delivery of Service on time
  • Is an ISO Certified Chartered Accountants Firm
  • Is listed with all major banks and free zones in the UAE.

Audit firms in Abu Dhabi

Whether you register your company in the free zone or mainland, it’s mandatory to provide audit certificates. Only registered auditors in Abu Dhabi are allowed to provide accounting and auditing services.

If you’re choosing a free zone, respective authorities will provide a list of approved auditors in Abu Dhabi who take the responsibility of conducting auditing for the respective free zone companies.

Benefits of choosing the best audit firm in Abu Dhabi,

Abu Dhabi authorities require fair and transparent conduct of business with audited financial statements. The records must be relevant according to the regulatory compliance requirement in Abu Dhabi. All the companies should comply with the tax and VAT regulations.

In such scenario, partnering with top audit firms in Abu Dhabi will assure some exciting benefits,

  • Comply with regulatory laws
  • Comply with financial regulations by Federal tax authority
  • Review and analysis of accounting, bookkeeping, and financial statements
  • Expert advice on fair conduct of business
  • Strategic financial planning
  • Financial risk identification and management

Why choose A&A Associate?

  • Greatest level of professionalism – Our qualified auditors ensure greatest-level of professionalism and personalized advice to our clients.
  • Effective business solutions – With a high-spirited team of auditors in Abu Dhabi, we make innovative contributions to our clients. With diverse experience in auditing, we prepare accurate audit reports and provide effective solutions without any concern.
  • Expert in finance – Being registered auditors in Abu Dhabi, our skills and expertise in handling tax or other financial matters allow your business to stay in control as far as the finances.
  • Comprehensive review – We ensure 360 degree view of the entire financial health of your firm. It’s helpful in planning the future business operations.

At A&A Associate, we have a team of expert auditors in Abu Dhabi who provide highest quality services to our clients. We will be your trusted audit firm in Dubai Abu Dhabi for professional auditing and accounting services.
